item.title: Law of Demeter: Some thoughts
item.description: Phil Haack wrote a post a few weeks ago about the law of demeter and how it’s not just about reducing the number of dots that appear on one line. This is a nice side effect of following the law of demeter but I often feel that the main benefit we get from following it is that code becomes easier to change since we haven’t exposed the state of an object all over the place.
